import { useState } from "react"; const InvestInput = (props) => { const [userInput, setUserInput] = useState( { "current-savings": "", "yearly-contribution": "", "expected-return": "", "duration": "", } ); const inputChangeHandler = (event) => { setUserInput({...userInput, [event.target.id]: event.target.value }); }; return (

); }; export default InvestInput;
